name: 張裕煦
objective: 本課程討論，利用儀器分析工作之理論，儀器之原理，構造操作等。包括光譜學基礎，UV-Vis，ICP-AES，FT-IR，XPS/Auger electron spectroscopy，SEM/AFM，TGA/DTA/DSC等儀器之探討。
schedule:
1.    Chap. 1  Introduction
2-3   Chap. 6  An introduction to spectrometric methods
3-4   Chap. 21 Surface characterization by spectroscopy & microscopy
5     exam 1
6     Chap. 31 Thermal methods
7-8   Chap. 8  An introduction to optical atomic spectrometry
9-10  Chap. 9  Atomic absorption and atomic fluorescence spectrometry
11    exam 2
12-13 Chap. 10 Atomic emission spectrometry
13-14 Chap. 14 Applications of UV/Vis absorption spectrometry
15-16 Chap. 16 An introduction to infrared spectrometry
17    Chap. 17 Applications of infrared spectrometry
18    exam 3
scorePolicy:

33.3 % midterm 1 + 33.3 % midterm 2 +
